alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 15 at 7:33AM PDT until October 15 at 12:45PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON PDT TODAY THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following area, Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From Noon PDT today through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve
